pr_title: Sends proper user agent for Auth

timeline.message: Sends proper user agent for Auth

timeline.bodyText:
It's a bad practice to mutate method arguments. Here, the following occurs:

pluginConfiguration has state A.
configure(..., pluginConfiguration, ...) runs.
pluginConfiguration has state B.

Instead, I would do:
JSONObject mobileClientConfig = new JSONObject(pluginConfiguration);
mobileClientConfig.put("UserAgentOverride", UserAgent.string());
timeline.author: jamesonwilliams
